name: Microsoft Basic Wired Optical Mouse
Features: [Optical Technology, Navigate with better speed, accuracy and reliability—the optical sensor tracks movement on nearly any surface without the hassle of clogged mouse parts., Scroll Even Faster, Move through your documents quickly without having to click on the scroll bar., Comfortable in Either Hand, Use your mouse with your left or right hand—ambidextrous design makes it comfortable either way., Customizable Buttons, Get quick access to the media, programs, and files you use most often with customizable buttons., Device Stage, Quickly and easily access common tasks, including product information, registration, settings and more for popular devices such as cell phones, cameras, printers, and mouse, keyboard and webcam products., Ergonomic Design, Point and click in comfort—ergonomic design helps you work longer without discomfort.]
